QuestData.Title: A Summons from Saylanna
QuestData.Description: Sprites have always been mischievous creatures, but lately their mischief has turned to violence.$B$BOne of the druids I call friend, Saylanna Riverbreeze, reports that they are assaulting the faerie dragon nesting grounds.$B$BThe Lunarwing Shallows lie to the south. You will find Saylanna there.
QuestData.LogDescription: Seek out Saylanna Riverbreeze in the Lunarwing Shallows.
